title: Filter Groups with HAVING
description: Write an SQL query to show course IDs that have more than 1 enrolled student.
expected_query: SELECT course_id, COUNT(*) AS student_count FROM enrollments GROUP BY course_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
hints: Use GROUP BY course_id to group enrollments
Use HAVING to filter groups after grouping
HAVING is like WHERE but for aggregated data
author: Jerico Jimenez
